content.thinking:
用户想要创建一个AI换衣应用。这是一个有趣的项目！让我思考一下这个应用需要什么：

1. AI换衣应用 - 用户上传照片，然后可以尝试不同的衣服
2. 这需要AI图像处理能力

让我先探索现有的代码库，了解项目结构，然后规划实现方案。

由于这是第一条消息，我需要：
1. 理解用户想要什么
2. 探索代码库
3. 设计一个漂亮的UI
4. 规划功能实现

让我先探索代码库结构。

content.text: 我来帮你创建一个AI换衣应用！让我先探索一下代码库结构，然后设计实现方案。

input.prompt:
Explore the codebase to understand:
1. Project structure and existing files
2. Current design system in index.css and tailwind.config.ts
3. Any existing components or utilities
4. Package.json dependencies

Focus on understanding what's already set up so we can build the AI clothes changing app on top of it.

content.text:
Perfect! I now have a comprehensive understanding of the project. Let me create a detailed report.

## Codebase Exploration Report: AI Clothes Changing App

I've thoroughly explored the project structure and design system. Here's what's already set up:

---

## 1. Project Structure

### Root Files
- `/app/package.json` - Main dependencies configuration
- `/app/vite.config.ts` - Vite build configuration with React SWC plugin
- `/app/tailwind.config.ts` - Tailwind CSS design system configuration
- `/app/tsconfig.json`, `/app/tsconfig.app.json` - TypeScript configuration with "@/" alias
- `/app/components.json` - shadcn/ui component configuration
- `/app/index.html` - Entry point with genfly editor script
- `/app/postcss.config.js` - PostCSS configuration
- `/app/eslint.config.js` - ESLint configuration

### Source Directory Structure (`/app/src`)
```
src/
├── main.tsx                 # React app entry point
├── App.tsx                  # Main app component with routing setup
├── index.css               # Tailwind CSS directives (minimal - no color vars defined)
├── App.css                 # App-level styles
├── vite-env.d.ts          # Vite type definitions
├── lib/
│   └── utils.ts           # Utility: cn() function (clsx + tailwind-merge)
├── hooks/
│   ├── use-mobile.tsx      # Hook: useIsMobile() for responsive design
│   └── use-toast.ts        # Hook: Toast notifications
├── pages/
│   ├── Index.tsx           # Home page (currently blank template)
│   └── NotFound.tsx        # 404 page
└── components/
    └── ui/                 # 49 shadcn/ui components
```

---

## 2. Design System (Tailwind + shadcn/ui)

### Tailwind Configuration (`/app/tailwind.config.ts`)

**Color System:**
- Uses HSL CSS variables for dynamic theming
- Available color scales:
  - `border`, `input`, `ring`, `background`, `foreground`
  - `primary` (with foreground), `secondary`, `destructive`, `muted`, `accent`, `popover`, `card`
  - `sidebar` variants (background, foreground, primary, accent, border, ring)

**Design Tokens:**
- Container: Centered with 2rem padding, max-width 1400px at 2xl breakpoint
- Border Radius: `lg` (var(--radius)), `md`, `sm` with scaling
- Animations: `accordion-down` and `accordion-up` (0.2s ease-out)
- Dark Mode: Class-based (`darkMode: ["class"]`)

**Plugins:**
- `tailwindcss-animate` for animation utilities

### Index.css (`/app/src/index.css`)

Currently **minimal and incomplete**:
```css
@tailwind base;
@tailwind components;
@tailwind utilities;

@layer base {
  :root {
    /* Color variables not defined yet */
  }

  .dark {
    /* Dark mode colors not defined yet */
  }
}
```

**Status**: The CSS variable definitions need to be added for the color system to work properly.

---

## 3. Existing Components & Utilities

### Utility Function (`/app/src/lib/utils.ts`)
```typescript
export function cn(...inputs: ClassValue[]) {
  return twMerge(clsx(inputs))
}
```
- Combines clsx and tailwind-merge for safe class composition

### Custom Hooks

**useIsMobile** (`/app/src/hooks/use-mobile.tsx`)
- Mobile breakpoint: 768px
- Returns boolean indicating if viewport is < 768px
- Uses media query listener for responsive behavior

**use-toast** (`/app/src/hooks/use-toast.ts`)
- Toast notification hook (3895 bytes)

### UI Component Library (49 shadcn Components)

**Form & Input Components:**
- `button.tsx` - Button with variants (default, destructive, outline, secondary, ghost, link) and sizes (sm, default, lg, icon)
- `input.tsx` - Text input with accessible styling
- `label.tsx` - Form label primitive
- `form.tsx` - Complete form integration with react-hook-form
- `textarea.tsx` - Multi-line text input
- `checkbox.tsx`, `radio-group.tsx`, `switch.tsx`, `toggle.tsx`, `toggle-group.tsx`
- `select.tsx`, `command.tsx`, `input-otp.tsx` - Selection components

**Layout & Display:**
- `card.tsx` - Card container with Header, Title, Description, Content, Footer sub-components
- `dialog.tsx` - Modal dialog with Trigger, Content, Header, Footer, Title, Description
- `drawer.tsx`, `sheet.tsx` - Drawer/sheet components
- `tabs.tsx`, `accordion.tsx`, `collapsible.tsx` - Grouping components
- `sidebar.tsx`, `breadcrumb.tsx`, `pagination.tsx` - Navigation components

**Data & Visualization:**
- `table.tsx` - Data table component
- `chart.tsx` - Charting component (using recharts)
- `carousel.tsx` - Image carousel (using embla-carousel)

**Feedback & Overlay:**
- `alert.tsx`, `alert-dialog.tsx` - Alert components
- `badge.tsx`, `skeleton.tsx` - Status indicators
- `toast.tsx`, `toaster.tsx` - Toast notifications (using sonner)

**Advanced Components:**
- `popover.tsx`, `hover-card.tsx`, `tooltip.tsx` - Popup components
- `scroll-area.tsx`, `resizable.tsx` - Layout components
- `dropdown-menu.tsx`, `context-menu.tsx`, `menubar.tsx`, `navigation-menu.tsx` - Menu components
- `progress.tsx`, `slider.tsx` - Input controls
- `aspect-ratio.tsx` - Media aspect ratio container

**Patterns:**
- All components use React.forwardRef for DOM access
- CVA (class-variance-authority) for type-safe variant patterns
- Radix UI primitives for accessibility
- cn() utility for conditional class composition

---

## 4. Package.json Dependencies

### Production Dependencies

**UI & Styling:**
- `@radix-ui/*` (20+ packages) - Unstyled accessible components
- `tailwindcss`, `tailwind-merge`, `tailwindcss-animate` - CSS framework
- `class-variance-authority` - Type-safe CSS variant composition
- `clsx` - Utility for conditional class names
- `lucide-react` - Icon library

**Form & Validation:**
- `react-hook-form` - Form state management
- `@hookform/resolvers` - Form validation resolvers
- `zod` - TypeScript-first schema validation

**State & Data:**
- `zustand` - Lightweight state management
- `@tanstack/react-query` - Server state management

**UI Patterns:**
- `framer-motion` - Animation library
- `sonner` - Toast notifications
- `recharts` - Charting library
- `embla-carousel-react` - Carousel component
- `react-day-picker` - Date picker
- `next-themes` - Theme switching
- `vaul` - Drawer component
- `react-resizable-panels` - Resizable layout

**Routing & Utils:**
- `react-router-dom` - Routing
- `uuid` - ID generation
- `date-fns` - Date utilities
- `cmdk` - Command palette
- `input-otp` - OTP input

### Dev Dependencies
- `vite@5.4.19` - Build tool
- `@vitejs/plugin-react-swc` - React SWC compiler
- `typescript@5.5.3` - Type checking
- `tailwindcss@3.4.11` - CSS framework
- `autoprefixer@10.4.20` - CSS vendor prefixes
- `eslint@9.9.0` + `typescript-eslint@8.0.1` - Linting
- `@types/react@18.3.3`, `@types/react-dom@18.3.0` - React types

---

## 5. Key Configuration

### Path Aliases (`tsconfig.json` & `vite.config.ts`)
```
@ → ./src
```

### Components.json (shadcn/ui config)
```json
{
  "style": "default",
  "baseColor": "slate",
  "cssVariables": true,
  "aliases": {
    "components": "@/components",
    "utils": "@/lib/utils",
    "ui": "@/components/ui",
    "lib": "@/lib",
    "hooks": "@/hooks"
  }
}
```

### Routing Structure (`App.tsx`)
- Uses React Router v6 with React Query
- Current routes:
  - `/` → Index page (home)
  - `*` → NotFound page (404)

---

## 6. What's Ready for the AI Clothes Changing App

**Strong Foundation:**
- Complete shadcn/ui component library (buttons, dialogs, forms, inputs, cards)
- Framer Motion for smooth animations
- Form handling with react-hook-form + Zod validation
- State management with Zustand
- Server state with React Query
- Image carousel component (embla-carousel)
- Modal/dialog system
- Toast notifications

**Needs Attention:**
- **Design System Colors**: Need to define CSS variables in `index.css` (currently empty)
- **Custom Pages**: Only blank Index page exists - ready for your clothing app pages
- **Custom Components**: No custom components yet - ready to add your domain-specific components

**Ready to Add:**
- Image upload/preview components
- Clothing item display/editor components
- AI processing components
- Before/after image comparison
- Styling controls (color, style adjustments)
- Outfit gallery/history

---

## Summary

This is a well-architected Vite + React + TypeScript + Tailwind + shadcn/ui starter with:
- Production-ready component library (49 components)
- Proper tooling (Vite, TypeScript, ESLint)
- Best practices (path aliases, proper hook setup, forwardRef patterns)
- Excellent dependencies for building an interactive AI clothes app

The main task is to populate the design system colors in `index.css` and start building your custom clothing-related features on top of this solid foundation.

content.thinking:
现在我对代码库有了全面的了解。这是一个标准的 Vite + React + TypeScript + Tailwind + shadcn/ui 项目模板。

对于AI换衣应用，我需要考虑：

1. **功能设计**：
   - 用户上传人物照片
   - 选择/上传想要试穿的衣服
   - AI处理生成换装后的效果图
   - 保存/下载结果

2. **UI设计**：
   - 现代、时尚的界面设计
   - 清晰的上传区域
   - 衣服选择/展示区
   - 结果展示区

3. **技术实现**：
   - 需要AI API来处理换衣功能
   - 图片上传和预览
   - 可能需要Supabase存储图片

让我问用户一些关键问题来明确需求。

content.text:
代码库已探索完毕。这是一个完整的 React + TypeScript + Tailwind + shadcn/ui 模板项目。

在设计实现方案前，我需要确认几个关键问题：

questions.question: 你希望使用哪个AI换衣服务/API？

options.label: 我有API
options.description: 我已有换衣API（如Replicate、自建服务等），需要集成

options.label: 仅UI演示
options.description: 先做UI界面，AI功能后续接入

options.label: Supabase Edge
options.description: 使用Supabase Edge Functions调用AI服务

questions.question: 应用的主要使用场景是什么？

options.label: 电商试衣
options.description: 用户试穿商品衣服，帮助购买决策

options.label: 个人换装
options.description: 用户上传自己的照片和衣服图片进行换装

options.label: 模特展示
options.description: 为服装品牌生成模特穿着效果图

questions.question: 你偏好什么风格的设计？

options.label: 时尚简约
options.description: 黑白为主，高端时装品牌风格

options.label: 活力多彩
options.description: 明亮渐变色，年轻活泼风格

options.label: 科技感
options.description: 深色背景，霓虹/渐变点缀，AI科技风

content.thinking: 用户还没有回答问题，我需要等待他们的回复。

content.text: 我已经探索了代码库，现在等待你的回答来确定最佳实现方案。这些选择将帮助我设计一个完全符合你需求的AI换衣应用。
